item.title: ACUITY BRANDS INC 10-K
item.description: ACUITY BRANDS INC, which is in the Electric Lighting & Wiring Equipment [3640] industry, SEC 10-K filing on October 26, 2022 had 28420 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
